properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer.compress-msg-body-over-howmuch
properties.description: Compress message body threshold, namely, message body larger than 4k will be compressed on default.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer.retry-times-when-send-failed
properties.description: Maximum number of retry to perform internally before claiming sending failure in synchronous mode.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer.retry-times-when-send-async-failed
properties.description: Maximum number of retry to perform internally before claiming sending failure in asynchronous mode.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer.retry-another-broker-when-not-store-ok
properties.description: Indicate whether to retry another broker on sending failure internally.

properties.name: spring.rocketmq.producer.max-message-size
properties.description: Maximum allowed message size in bytes.
